Pre-Game Insights: Algeria is eager to impress after a shambolic 2021 run in Cameroon
Captain Riyad Mahrez and his colleagues aim to make amends by going past stiff opposition in Angola

Angola has recorded just a win over Algeria (2006 World Cup Qualifiers) and six of their encounters have been played out as drawn games
